description: Read the signpost in Canifis.

2.step: Take a pickled brain off the table for 50gp. (Chat 1)

description: Take a pickled brain off the table for 50gp.
Talk to Dr. Fenkenstrain.

4.step: Go upstairs and search the west bookcase for 'The Joy of Gravedigging'. (Chat 4)

description: Go upstairs.
Search the west bookcase.

5.step: Search the east bookcase for 'Handy Maggot Avoidance Techniques'. (Chat 3)

description: Search the east bookcase for 'Handy Maggot Avoidance Techniques'.

6.step: Use the marble amulet on the obsidian amulet to make a star amulet.

description: Use the marble amulet on the obsidian amulet to make a star amulet.

7.step: Talk to the Gardener Ghost with the Ghostspeak amulet equipped. (Chat 2)
7.subtitle: The Gardener's Head

description: Talk to the Gardener Ghost with the Ghostspeak amulet equipped.

8.step: Dig in front of a grave marker. (Be sure the Gardener is following you.)

description: Dig in front of a grave marker. Make sure the Gardener is following you, or else this step will not work.

9.step: Use the brain on the head.

description: Use the brain on the head.

10.step: Use your star amulet on the eastern-most memorial then push it.
10.subtitle: Experiment Cave (Torso, arms, legs)

description: Use your star amulet on the eastern-most memorial then push it.
Push the memorial.

11.step: Defeat a level 51 Experiment for the cavern key.

description: Defeat a level 51 Experiment for the cavern key.

12.step: Search the chest and climb the ladder (North-western path).

description: Open the gate entrance.
Search the chest.
Search the chest and climb the ladder.

13.step: Dig at the three graves to get the torso, arms and legs.

description: Dig at the first grave for the torso.
Dig at the second grave for arms.
Dig at the third grave for legs.

14.step: Talk to Dr. Fenkenstrain (to give him the body parts). (Chat 1)
14.subtitle: Lightning

description: Talk to Dr. Fenkenstrain o give him the body parts.

15.step: Talk to Dr. Fenkenstrain again (to give him the needle and thread).

description: Talk to Dr. Fenkenstrain again to give him the needle and thread.

16.step: Talk to the Gardener Ghost (for the shed key). (Chat 2)

description: Talk to the Gardener Ghost for the shed key.

17.step: Take 3 canes from the pile of canes next to the shed.

description: Take 3 canes from the pile of canes next to the shed.

18.step: Search the cupboard inside the shed.

description: Search the cupboard inside the shed.

19.step: Use all 3 canes on the broom to get a extended brush.

description: Use all 3 canes on the broom to get a extended brush.

20.step: Go upstairs and use the extended brush on the fireplace (for a conductor mould).

description: Go upstairs.
Use the extended brush on the fireplace

21.step: Go to a furnace smelt a silver bar into a lightning rod.

description: Go to a furnace smelt a silver bar into a lightning rod.
Choose to make the lightning rod.

22.step: Go upstairs and then climb the southern ladder.

description: Go upstairs.
Climb the southern ladder.
Repair the lightning conductor.
Talk to the Dr. Fenkenstrain.

25.step: Go upstairs, then climb the northern ladder.

description: Go upstairs.
Climb the northern ladder.
Talk to Fenkenstrain's Monster.

27.step: Go downstairs, then pickpocket the Dr. Fenkenstrain for the Ring of Charos.
27.subtitle: Finishing up

description: Go downstairs, then pickpocket the doctor for the Ring of Charos.
